mapper.update:

diaType = #{diaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datName = #{datName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
datTime = #{datTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
datScope = #{datScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
